article.title: BAE Supports C4I Program
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Technology Solutions and Services Incorporated, Rockville, Maryland, is being awarded a $17,224,611 contract modification to exercise an option for approximately 260 thousand hours of engineering and technical services in support of the Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division's Special Communications Requirements Division's Command, Control, Communications, Computers and Intelligence Communications-Electronics Program.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
